definition: to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Newton's law is not applicable to any case.
sentences.chinese: 牛顿定律并不适合于任何情况。

sentences.english: Huizhou located at Xizhi Jiang nearby, the fine scenery, suits the housing.
sentences.chinese: 惠州位于西枝江旁，风景优美，适合居住。

sentences.english: The Honolulu Blue Guest Room is a cozy cool escape from the summer sun.
sentences.chinese: 檀香山蓝色客房舒适凉爽，适合躲避夏日艳阳。

sentences.english: The leaders of the city always boast that the city is the most suitable place for human beings to live.
sentences.chinese: 海口市当局总是吹嘘这个城市最适合人类居住。

sentences.english: What kind of work experience dob you have?
If you're starting out, you'll need tools to till the soil.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是个新手，你需要工具把地整理得适合种菜。

sentences.english: Signals in the spectrum can penetrate walls, making it ideal for wireless broadband.
sentences.chinese: 该频段的信号可以穿透墙壁，从而非常适合无线宽带。

sentences.english: If you spend long hours at work a dog is not for you.
sentences.chinese: 如果你花长时间在上班那你就不适合养狗。

sentences.english: Sir, what kind of work in the production process suits me best?
sentences.chinese: 那师傅你觉得我最适合做哪道工序呢？

sentences.english: Therefore, they are more suited for playing games like chess.
sentences.chinese: 因此，他们较适合玩像西洋棋这类的游戏。

sentences.english: Caching works best for read-only data.
sentences.chinese: 缓存非常适合于只读数据。

sentences.english: Which typeface is perfect for this design?
sentences.chinese: 哪个字体最适合这个设计？

sentences.english: Aunt is ready for you to eat the teeth do not hurt the sugar, to taste, welcome to.
sentences.chinese: 阿姨准备了适合你吃不伤牙齿的糖，欢迎到时来尝尝。

sentences.english: Objective To verify the specificity and validity of the microbial limit tests of glycyrrhetinic acid.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立适合于甘草酸的微生物限度检查方法。

sentences.english: Furniture suits to use take carven Euramerican furniture style.
sentences.chinese: 家具适合用带雕刻的欧美家具样式。

sentences.english: Not all properties are appropriate for all versions of queue manager.
sentences.chinese: 并非所有属性都适合于所有版本的队列管理器。

definition: first choice/premium/to come first in the imperial examinations
best/(you) had better (do what we suggest)
to be partial towards sth/to favor/to prefer/preference/favorite
